word_mean: 通常由耕作引起的不同大小的坚实土体。

sentence.Network_en: A clod of silt can easily be crumbled in the fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 手指能很容易把一块泥土粉碎.

sentence.Network_en: Eisenhower, clod and grumpy, said, " Well, I thought you should have done this a long time ago. "
sentence.Network_cn: 艾森豪威尔冷淡而粗暴地说: “ 唔, 我认为你早就应该这样做了. ”

sentence.Network_en: These people can blow hot and clod to serve their purpose.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人为自己的目的可出尔反尔.

entry.def: A clod of earth is a large lump of earth.
